pkgmetadata.longdescription: ATBU Backup & Persistent File Information is a local/cloud backup/restorecommand-line utility with optional deduplication and bitrot detection,plus a little utility with useful digest-based directory file diff'ing.Install: `pip install atbu-pkg`GitHub: https://github.com/AshleyT3/atbuDocumentation: https://atbu.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
